content.title: Theka Shramik Evan Hamaal Shramik Baahy Rogi Chikitsa Sahaayata Yojana
content.details: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme 'Theka Shramik Evan Hamaal Shramik Baahy Rogi Chikitsa Sahaayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 27 August 2015. The main objective of the scheme to provide financial assistance for the medical treatment.
eligibility: Applicant should be registered in any district of the state.
If applicant received from any other parallel scheme of the State Government, then applicant is not eligible for this scheme.
Beneficiaries aged between 18 years to 60 years will be eligible under the scheme.
documents_required: Disease details by Vikas khand Adhikari / Surgeon / Chief medical officer/ Heath Officer.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Gharelu Mahila Kamgar Cycle, Chhatari, Chappal/Joota Sahayta Yojana' for unorganized worker on 11 March 2015.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The main objective of the scheme to provide financial assistance for the medical treatment.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible unorganized worker from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: What is the eligible age to get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be between 18 and 60 years old.

faqs.question: Can applicant get the benefits of parallel scheme from the state government?
faqs.answer: Applicant must not receiving any other parallel scheme of the state government.

faqs.question: What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be registered under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Only than applicant can apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How can applicant register under Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Enter the following details, Select Group Name : 'Asangathit Marmakaar Mandal' Select Service : 'Asangathit Shramik Panjikaran' What do you want to do : 'Aavedan' Click next. Check the eligibility criteria for registration in Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board and click next. Fill out the online 'Registration form'. Submit.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Provide the required details. Fill out the application form. Submit.
